pageProduct.name: Swisse Skincare Vitamin B3 Blemish Controlling Moisturiser 120ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Vitamin B3 Blemish Controlling Moisturiser is a lightweight, oil-free formula that combines a powerhouse of ingredients to prevent and reduce the appearance of blemishes while hydrating the skin, for a clear and shine-free complexion.

Size: 120mL

KEY FEATURES

• ? Supports collagen production and skin repair
• ? Supports skin firmness and elasticity
• ? Helps reduce free radical damage to body cells

Warnings

Test prior to use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, consult your medical practitioner.

Ingredients

KEY INGREDIENTS:


AQUA (Water)
Glycerin (Plant Derived)
Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
Glyceryl Stearate SE
NIACINAMIDE (VITAMIN B3)
Propanediol
Cetearyl Alcohol
Salicylic Acid
Dimethicone
GREEN TEA Camellia Sinensis Leaf Powder
CUCUMBER Cucumis Sativus Extract
Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate
Fragrance Natural fragrance
Xanthan Gum
Sodium Citrate
Benzyl Alcohol
Dehydroacetic Acid

Directions

Apply as required to face and décolletage. Massage gently into skin in a circular motion.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store upright below 28°C.
